reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: To contribute to achieving Vision 2030 through universal access to comprehensive HIV prevention, treatment and care

description.narrative: Kenya - HIV - Kenya Red Cross Society - KRCS. This program has the following goals: To contribute to achieving Vision 2030 through universal access to comprehensive HIV prevention, treatment and care.. The objectives of this program are: Reduce new HIV infections by 75%. Reduce AIDS related mortality by 25%

Coverage / Output indicator for KEN-H-KRCS
TCS-Other 1: Number of adults and children living with HIV who receive care and support services outside facilities
Percentage of adolescent girls and young women (AGYW) reached with HIV prevention programs- defined package of services
CSS Other 1: Percentage of community units (CUs) in the target area implementing integrated community health services for HIV, TB and Malaria
Percentage of individuals receiving Opioid Substitution Therapy who received treatment for at least 6 months
Percentage of men who have sex with men that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
TCS-Other: Number of PLHIV (Defaulter/lost to follow up) reached and linked backed to care through community health networks.
Percentage of young people aged 10–24 years reached by comprehensive sexuality education and/or life skills–based HIV education out of schools
Number of needles and syringes distributed per person who injects drugs per year by needle and syringe programs
Percentage of sex workers that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of eligible men who have sex with men who initiated oral antiretroviral PrEP during the reporting period
Percentage of sex workers reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
TCS Other-1: Number of adults and children living with HIV who receive care and support services outside facilities
Percentage of adolescent girls and young women reached with HIV prevention programs- defined package of services
Percentage of men who have sex with men reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Percentage of people who inject drugs reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Percentage of eligible sex workers who initiated oral antiretroviral PrEP during the reporting period
Outcome indicator for KEN-H-KRCS
Percentage of men reporting the use of a condom the last time they had anal sex with a non regular partner
Percentage of people living with HIV who report experiences of HIV-related discrimination in health-care settings
Percentage of men who have sex with men who avoid health care because of stigma and discrimination
Proportion of ever-married or partnered women aged 15-49 who experienced physical or sexual violence from a male intimate partner in the past 12 months
Percentage of females aged 15-24 who dropped out of school in the last year
Percentage of sex workers who avoid health care because of stigma and discrimination
Percentage of people living with HIV reporting their rights were violated who sought legal redress
Percentage of people who inject drugs reporting the use of sterile injecting equipment the last time they injected
Percentage of sex workers reporting the use of a condom with their most recent client
Percentage of adults and children with HIV, known to be on treatment 12 months after initiation of antiretroviral therapy
Percentage of women and men aged 15-49 who have had sexual intercourse with more than one partner in the past 12 months
Percentage of people living with HIV and on ART who are virologically suppressed
Impact indicator for KEN-H-KRCS
Number of new HIV infections per 1000 uninfected population
HIV incidence among 15-49 age group
Percentage of young people aged 15–24 who are living with HIV
Percentage of people living with HIV
Estimated percentage of children newly infected with HIV from mother-to-child transmission among women living with HIV delivering in the past 12 months
Number of AIDS-related deaths per 100,000 population
